products.name: Glowing Hair Shield Spray
products.description: Glowing Hair Shield Spray is a protective hair mist designed to shield your hair from environmental damage, heat styling, and UV rays. Enriched with nourishing ingredients, it helps to maintain moisture, reduce frizz, and enhance shine.
products.ingredients: Aloe Vera, Green Tea Extract, Vitamin E, Argan Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Glycerin, Citrus Extract
benefits: - Protects against heat styling and UV rays

products.name: Bio-shroom Rejuvenating Serum
products.description: The Bio-Shroom Rejuvenating Serum revitalizes skin with a potent blend of mushroom extracts, promoting hydration, reducing fine lines, and restoring a natural, radiant glow. Perfect for daily skincare.
products.ingredients: Reishi Mushroom Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Chaga Mushroom Extract, Vitamin C, Aloe Vera
benefits: - Brightens complexion and evens skin tone.

products.name: Mountain Pine Altogether Bath Oil
products.description: Get yourself together with this universal oil made from natural ingredients. High concentrations of jojoba and macadamia oils work together to instantly hydrate all your parts— from the top of your scalp to the tips of your toes.
products.ingredients: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Ethyl Macadamiate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Citrus Sinensis (Sweet Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Petitgrain) Leaf/Twig Oil, Elettaria Cardamomum (Cardamom) Oil, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil, Coriandrum Sativum (Coriander) Leaf Oil Organic

products.name: S-Energy Facial Mousse Cleanser
products.description: The S-Energy Facial Mousse Cleanser is a luxurious, gentle, and effective facial cleanser designed to deeply cleanse and purify the skin while maintaining its natural moisture balance. Its airy, mousse-like texture transforms into a soft lather that effortlessly removes dirt, oil, and makeup, leaving the skin feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.
products.ingredients: Aloe Vera Extract, Chamomile Extract, Vitamin E, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol
benefits: - Removes dirt, oil, and makeup gently.
- Helps maintain skin's natural moisture balance.
- Revitalizes the complexion, leaving it feeling soft and smooth.

products.name: Bright Eyes- Eye Mask
products.description: Bright Eyes Eye Mask is designed to reduce puffiness, dark circles, and signs of fatigue around the eyes. Infused with nourishing ingredients, it hydrates and revitalizes the delicate skin, leaving you with refreshed, bright eyes for a more youthful look.
products.ingredients: Aloe Vera Extract, Cucumber Extract, Chamomile Extract, Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid, Glycerin, Jojoba Oil, Peptides, Allantoin, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol
benefits: - Reduces puffiness and dark circles around the eyes.
- Soothes and calms the delicate skin under the eyes.
- Helps improve skin elasticity and smoothness.
- Revitalizes the eye area, leaving it feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

products.name: Glowing Skin Moisturizer 50gm
products.description: Glowing Skin Moisturizer is expertly formulated to hydrate and nourish your skin, giving it a radiant glow. Enriched with a blend of natural ingredients, this moisturizer absorbs quickly and helps to maintain the skin's moisture balance, leaving it soft, smooth, and youthful.
products.ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Aloe Vera Extract, Jojoba Oil, Shea Butter, Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, Allantoin, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol
benefits: - Deeply hydrates and nourishes the skin.
- Enhances skin radiance and natural glow.

products.name: Cleansing Mousse Serum
products.description: A lightweight, airy mousse that gently cleanses the skin while removing impurities and makeup. Infused with hydrating ingredients, it leaves your skin feeling fresh, soft, and rejuvenated.
products.ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Aloe Vera Extract, Chamomile Extract, Vitamin E, Panthenol, Allantoin, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin
benefits: - Gently cleanses the skin without stripping natural oils.
- Leaves the skin feeling soft, fresh, and revitalized.
